URLTransaction

public class URLTransaction: DataTransaction

A DataTransaction that uses an NSURLRequest to request data from (and potentially send data to) a service at a given URL.

A successful transaction produces an NSData instance, and if the request was sent via HTTP or HTTPS, the transaction metadata will contain an HTTPResponseMetadata instance.

  • url

    The URL of the network service that will be sent the request when the transaction is executed.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public var url: NSURL { return request.URL! }
  • request

    The NSURLRequest that will be issued when the transaction is executed.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let request: NSURLRequest
  • uploadData

    Optional data to send to the service when executing the transaction.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let uploadData: NSData?
  • sessionConfiguration

    The NSURLSessionConfiguration used to create the NSURLSession for the transaction’s request.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let sessionConfiguration: NSURLSessionConfiguration
  • init(url:uploadData:sessionConfiguration:)

    Initializes a new transaction that will connect to the given URL.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public init(url: NSURL, uploadData: NSData? = nil, sessionConfiguration: NSURLSessionConfiguration = .defaultSessionConfiguration())
  • init(request:uploadData:sessionConfiguration:)

    Initializes a new transaction that will send to the given request.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public init(request: NSURLRequest, uploadData: NSData? = nil, sessionConfiguration: NSURLSessionConfiguration = .defaultSessionConfiguration())

    Parameters

    request

    The request to send to the network service.
    uploadData

    Optional data to send to the network service.
    sessionConfiguration

    The NSURLSessionConfiguration used to create the NSURLSession for the transaction’s request.
  • executeTransaction(_:)

    Causes the transaction to be executed. The transaction may be performed asynchronously. When complete, the Result is reported to the Callback function.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func executeTransaction(completion: Callback)

    Parameters

    completion

    A function that will be called upon completion of the transaction.
